text: {"answer":"B","reasoning":"i is incorrect because general information posters/TV spots typically are not individually binding administrative decisions and thus not directly appealable; ii is incorrect because the Digest (Pandects) was a comprehensive compilation of juristic writings, not a short student introduction; iii is incorrect because new facts/evidence are subject to procedural limits (no unrestricted noven); v is incorrect because in autopoiesis (Luhmann), law and politics are operationally closed systems—law does not “trigger democratic impulses” in that sense."}
